title: Siofra's Song
description: Half-breed, telepathic werewolf Siofra O'Hana has suffered one too many tragedies in her life. She takes a cross country trek to find herself and to get away from the darkness surrounding her home. Breaking down in a small Montana town, she thinks she might find happiness and her mate. A year later someone from her past returns to turn her world upside down, again. Can Siofra survive to keep her loved ones safe?
author: Theresa Marguerite Hewitt
